price: 35. Y dejamos de ella (las ruinas) como una clara advertencia (y un motivo de reflexión) para quienes razonan.
arabic: وَلَقَد تَّرَكۡنَا مِنۡهَآ ءَايَةَۢ بَيِّنَةٗ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: walaqad taraknā min'hā āyatan bayyinatan liqawmin yaʿqilūna
